projectName.description: Logical name of the project or application under test.

baseUrl.description: Base URL of the website under test.

useDataTestIdOnly.description: If true, the agent should strongly prefer data-test-id selectors and avoid text/layout-based selectors.

defaultTestDirectory.description: Default directory where the agent suggests saving generated tests.

defaultTags.description: Default tags the agent should suggest for tests (e.g. @regression, @smoke).

enforcePageObjectModel.description: If true, the agent must always propose and use Page Objects (Page Object Model) for test implementation.

allowThirdPartyTools.description: If false, the agent must not rely on any third-party tools, providers, or frameworks outside Playgride.

language.description: Preferred language for explanations and comments (e.g. 'en', 'es').

maxScenariosPerRequest.description: Maximum number of test scenarios the agent should generate per user request.
